name: the fall of man
description:
Can you save your little sister while your life turns into a dystopian nightmare?

This is a 15 minute one-shot pixel-art game.

It's about moral choices and their consequences.

And it's about anything and everything.

Features:

  • Minimalist Gameplay, but a strong narrative
  • 12 possible endings
  • A lot of small hints and details
  • Pixel blood
  • Strong language & funny spelling mistakes
